articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
🚨 AIRDROP RUMOUR 🚨
Could be a good play to stake some $MATIC in @omnidotapp.
Reasons 👇
1. You get a chance to win from a prize pool of $10,000
2. You earn $MATIC staking yield
3. Chance of an $OMNI token down the line 🪂
Omni: Omni is excited to launch our inaugural Staking Sweepstakes! Stake as you would, enter for a chance to win prize money 💸💸💸
Our first Sweepstakes will kick off with $MATIC staking and a total prize pool worth 10,000 USD 💰
You have until January 8th to enter. Here's how ⬇️

articles.description:
🚨 AIRDROP CONFIRMED 🚨
@SturdyFinance has announced its $STRY airdrop to select users:
- Yearn stablecoin vault users
- specific Convex LP's
- Sturdy lenders & borrowers
- Top 500 @DegenScore
- LP's in select Aura pools
Check your eligibility here:

DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊: 🚨 AIRDROP RUMOUR 🚨
@SturdyFinance is a lending platform with a focus on interest-bearing collateral.
E.g you can deposit Curve sUSD LP tokens earning 10% APY and then borrow $USDC or $DAI against that same collateral at 0% borrow cost.
Why 0%? 👇

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
Re Ultimately, it boils down to reputation. 
If the DAO is in the capacity to pay back the loan 1 year from now, it is incentivized to so, else it would face significant backlash.
This is for degens who like to be at the frontier of DeFi and want to support debt markets for DAO's.

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
Re These kind of loans obviously come with significant risks.
Revenues of DAO's are highly volatile & can dry up completely.
To mitigate risks somewhat, the bonds are over-collateralized in governance tokens (in this case 250% LTV in $FOX).

articles.description:

@arborfinance is allowing DAO's to raise fixed rate debt by issuing bonds.

This bond offering with @ShapeShift can yield up to 20.8%.
Read on👇

articles.description:
🚨 LARGEST NFT AIRDROP 🚨
Paradigm backed Web3 game @DigiDaigaku has booked an Ad slot for this years Superbowl.
They will drop a free Dragon game item to anyone scanning a QR-code appearing in the ad.
Could be a fun way to get involved in the game.
12th of February 2023.
DigiDaigaku: The DigiDaigaku Super Bowl Ad will feature the first ever FREE MINT on TV viewed by over 50M people! 🙌
1/6
